meta.article_title: November 9, 2020 - Think Tactics, Then Let Go

debutant.proposition: Think about what you want to do before the start of the rally

exercices_complementaires.nom: Blank out your mind and let shots happen
exercices_complementaires.description: Consciously think about what you want to do during a rally, then let your subconscious mind take over

metriques_progression.repertoire: Play with a focus on letting go and trusting your subconscious mind

erreurs_a_eviter.pitfall: Trying to control every shot during a rally
